message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product that I'm sure you'll find interesting. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm looking to pay closer to $1,000,000.  Let me know if that's something you'd be willing to consider.
I understand you're looking to pay $1,000,000, but I have to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,300,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
